author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Natural Alternatives - Co Entered Into An Amendment Of Its Credit Facility With Wells Fargo Bank, National Association​
text:
March 26 (Reuters) - Natural Alternatives International Inc :
* NATURAL ALTERNATIVES INTERNATIONAL - ‍ON MARCH 20 , CO ENTERED INTO AN AMENDMENT OF ITS CREDIT FACILITY WITH WELLS FARGO BANK, NATIONAL ASSOCIATION​
* NATURAL ALTERNATIVES INTERNATIONAL INC - AMENDMENT TO EXTEND MATURITY DATE FOR WORKING CAPITAL LINE OF CREDIT TO FEB 1, 2021
* NATURAL ALTERNATIVES INTERNATIONAL - AMENDMENT REMOVED ANY RESTRICTIONS INCLUDED IN CREDIT FACILITY ON CO'S PURCHASE OF ITS COMMON STOCK​ Source text ( bit.ly/2I5C1Kr ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
